# @withstudiocms/config-utils

## 0.1.0-beta.3

### Patch Changes

- [#685](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/685) [`169c9be`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/169c9be7649bbd9522c6ab68a9aeca4ebfc2b86d) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Add tests to ensure functionality of main utils

## 0.1.0-beta.2

### Patch Changes

- [#666](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/666) [`0b1574b`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/0b1574bfe32ef98dc62ed9082a132a540f0ad4ba) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Tweak watch config utility to be a builder akin to the configresolver util

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

# @withstudiocms/config-utils

## 0.1.0-beta.3

### Patch Changes

- [#685](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/685) [`169c9be`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/169c9be7649bbd9522c6ab68a9aeca4ebfc2b86d) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Add tests to ensure functionality of main utils

## 0.1.0-beta.2

### Patch Changes

- [#666](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/666) [`0b1574b`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/0b1574bfe32ef98dc62ed9082a132a540f0ad4ba) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Tweak watch config utility to be a builder akin to the configresolver util

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

children.name: APIEndpointConfig - should create config for type: posts
Libravatar Utils - serviceName for domain "example.com" with https=false
action - should return undefined for meta keys in select mode
printInfo logs correctly for fileSize: 11, executionTime: 100
should handle complex nested JSON structures
should throw error when file does not exist
Libravatar Utils - serviceName for domain "example.com" with https=true
Utility - getIndent returns " " for input " hello world "

generateHostContent returns empty string for host: example.com
RawPageData - should validate all required fields are present

Session Utility - makeSessionId throws SessionError if input is not a string
createClackMessageUpdate - should write to stream when rendering
KyselyTableManager can create and manage plugin tables
boxen - should create a boxed output with body
validateUrl throws for invalid sitemap url: ftp://example.com/sitemap.xml
APIEndpointConfig - should ensure config is defined
Password Utility - verifyPasswordLength - should return "undefined" for input "123456"
FALLBACK_OG_IMAGE should be defined and a valid URL
getEnabledNotificationCheckboxes - should ignore unknown keys in FormData
validateHost throws for invalid host: invalid_host
readJson - reads and parses JSON file content
Session Module - validateSessionToken returns null for invalid session
StringConfig - should create layer with makeLayer
Password Utility - breakSecurePassword throws error for input "legacy:salt:hash"
dt (DateTimeFormat) - should format time in 12-hour format

quoteIdent correctly quotes identifier for mysql
